history.proof: intros. apply In_perm in H. strivial use: Permutation_sym.

exceptions.tactic: apply Permutation_In_inv in H as [m1 [m2 H1]].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall l1 l2, l1 ~p l2 -> forall x : X, In x l1 -> exists l r : list X, l2 = l ++ x :: r" on hypothesis of type "exists m : list X, x :: m ~p l".

original: intros X x l H. apply In_perm in H. apply Permutation_In_inv in H as [m1 [m2 H1]]. exists (m1). auto.
